name: Design Of Love
description:
Start your epic journey as you piece together mystery clues, unlock the secrets of your past, and discover the truth behind bitter rivalries and family secrets!

Your world feels like it’s fallen apart and your dreams shattered. You aspire to follow in your mother’s footsteps within the biggest design agency and the hard work just didn’t pay off. Don’t despair! When one door closes another one opens with a new opportunity offering a fresh start.

As you explore the dynamic world of architecture, tough decisions will need to be made. Relationships will blossom, chemistry will be created and who you can trust will be tested. Customise your appearance as you navigate the twists and turns of your love life and destined career. Will you stay loyal to your mentor, the charismatic Hugo Vera, or will you fall for the flamboyant Alexander Bergman. Make your choices wisely as you decide whether to follow your head or your heart.

Do you have what it takes to rise to the top of your field, or will you fall victim to the cutthroat competition? Put your problem solving skills to the test with unique puzzle minigames to help you discover those hidden answers.

You’re in the driving seat and the control is all yours. The fate of your future is in your hands!
